Package io.github.jonestimd.swing.table.model

Interface ChangeBufferTableModel<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BeanTableModel<T>, ChangeBuffer, ColumnIdentifier, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedBeanListTableModel, BufferedHeaderDetailTableModel, ValidatedBeanListTableModel
    public interface ChangeBufferTableModel<T>
extends BeanTableModel<T>, ColumnIdentifier, ChangeBuffer
    A table model that stores changes until committed or reverted.

        boolean queueDelete​(T bean)
        Returns:
        true if the delete was queued, false if the row was an unsaved addition and was deleted immediately.
